description: ring foot with vertical sides; rounded bowl; decorated with Masonic symbols; pair of sphere-topped columns on a checkered floor, flanking the sun at bottom interior; sun and moon with faces, stars and water spouting from rocks at edges of bowl; exterior has four vignettes with Masonic tools and symbols; white with multicolored decorations; for the Western market
markings: on underside, two stickers: [The Oriental / Impression] and [# / 5957]
title: Bowl
